amendment.description: Amendment comprised of the following amendments offered en bloc: amendments numbered 127, 128, 129, 130, 131, 132, 133, 135, 136, 137, 138, 139, 140, 142, 46, 143, 144, 145, 146, and 147 printed in House Report 112-88.
amendment.purpose: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in House Report 112-88 offered as en bloc # 5: Nos. 127, 128, 129, 130, 131, 132, 133, 135, 136, 137, 138, 139, 140, 142, 46, 143, 144, 145, 146, and 147.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A047) offered by Mr. McKeon.
On agreeing to the McKeon amendments (A047) Agreed to by voice vote.
